Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Scarab
Description: Coarsely manufactured scarab whose elytra are not or barely shown, most probably worn down like part of the enamel on the back. On the flat surface, a cartouche bears the signs Nefer-Re ("Re is perfect") while prophylactic signs such as Ankh ("life"), wadj ("green") and sa ("protection") surround and top this cartouche.
